name: ghostwriter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who writes a book or article, etc. for another person to publish under his or her own name: He should have hired a ghostwriter to make his case. The novel was largely written by an unacknowledged ghostwriter. See
ghostwrite
More examplesFewer examplesA growing number of professional ghostwriters are widely available. The authors could not reveal their identities as ghostwriters.It's not unusual for a prominent political figure to employ a ghostwriter for a memoir.
